A lot of time will be spent this week and the next on documentation, with the aim of making the expectations for mainnet already clear. afaik community tools (ethstaker, eth-docker, ethereumonarm, etc) are all aware of the timelines and have already started efforts in the direction of releases, education and even a validator workshop.
